AD_BaldursGateEmptyStallSign.synopsis: A board next to an empty stall

AD_BalduransStrakePlaque.synopsis: Plaque in front of a statue of Balduran in the city

AD_BaldursGateEmptyStallSign_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_BaldursGateEmptyStallSign_0.text: *Out for restocking, will return shortly - if I can find any more stock.*

AD_BalduransStrakePlaque_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_BalduransStrakePlaque_0.text: *The statue is of Balduran, founder of the City, forever looking out to sea.*
